scripts.build: npm i && tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && rimraf platforms && cd ../demo-ng && rimraf platforms
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-webrtc && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-webrtc && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms cd ../demo-ng && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules
